column9: I was prescribed this drug after receiving antibiotics after minor surgery. I found it hard to remember the tablets 5 times a day, they don't disolve well and after a 2 week use the thrush came right back. I am very unsatisfied with this product.

column2: dede, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)

I suffered with inflammed tastebuds for 10 days before getting this prescribed and it was gone in 4 days.  Lozenges have no taste and dissolve in 15 minutes or less.
